article: a nationwide campaign aimed at reversing the trend of casual dress in the workplace has been launched by a clothier who is spearheading `` dress-up thursdays , '' an initiative that he and others hope will bring a sense of traditionalism back to the office and sales back to the tailored clothing industry .
abstract: unk stitch together campaign against casual garb
